contents.title: Contract Management
contents.content: Negotiate, draft, and finalize farming contracts digitally. Manage quantity, quality, delivery schedules, and payment terms all in one place.

contents.title: Price Negotiation
contents.content: Use our dynamic price negotiation tool to agree on fair prices. Leverage real-time market data and demand forecasts for optimal pricing.

contents.title: Secure Payments
contents.content: Ensure timely and secure payments with our integrated payment gateways and escrow services, protecting both farmers and buyers.

contents.title: Communication Channel
contents.content: Stay connected with integrated chat. Ensure transparent and efficient communication between farmers and buyers.

contents.title: Real-Time Updates
contents.content: Get real-time updates on market trends, weather forecasts, and other vital farming information to stay ahead of the curve.

contents.title: AI-Powered Insights
contents.content: Leverage AI to analyze data and receive personalized insights for your farming practices and contract negotiations.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.content: AgriShield simplifies the contract farming process, providing a seamless experience from contract negotiation to harvest delivery.
